item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JH88WN7G4XEA6RRF5KXT8VJX
item.description: @stefan Wait, so you’ll need your #Fediverse credentials in order to do hashtag search? That’s a bummer. I was supposed to be working on implementing a link from my blog at deuts.org/âˆž to the related search results page in Fediverse Explorer.
item.content:encoded: @stefan Wait, so you’ll need your #Fediverse credentials in order to do hashtag search? That’s a bummer. I was supposed to be working on implementing a link from my blog at deuts.org/âˆž to the related search results page in Fediverse Explorer.

item.title: Pixelfed Auto Installer
item.description:
Pixelfed Auto Installer

This script is designed to automate the initial deployment of Pixelfed and its related components using Docker and bash scripting.

This is a free-to-use Bash script that allows you to easily install Pixelfed and enhance its security with a single command. You can utilize this script on a blank server or an existing server, making it suitable for both new and experienced Pixelfed server owners.
item.content:encoded:
Pixelfed Auto Installer

This script is designed to automate the initial deployment of Pixelfed and its related components using Docker and bash scripting.

This is a free-to-use Bash script that allows you to easily install Pixelfed and enhance its security with a single command. You can utilize this script on a blank server or an existing server, making it suitable for both new and experienced Pixelfed server owners.

Not as seamless as a simple compose.yml, but I hope you can get one going in an instant.

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JH822N8EE0DYTA3KH09HNFX4
item.description: If you’re looking for a good #MiniPC in the Philippines, you’ll likely find better deals at #Datablitz: ecommerce.datablitz.com.ph/âˆž They offer competitive prices and a trusted online merchant. While their selection may be limited, their prices are often more affordable compared to that from #Lazada or #Shopee.
item.content:encoded: If you’re looking for a good #MiniPC in the Philippines, you’ll likely find better deals at #Datablitz: ecommerce.datablitz.com.ph/âˆž They offer competitive prices and a trusted online merchant. While their selection may be limited, their prices are often more affordable compared to that from #Lazada or #Shopee.
